m_szDocTitle: METHOD AND PAYMENT UNIT FOR CONTROLLING AN AMOUNT AVAILABLE FOR PAYMENT IN A VEHICLE - TELEFONAKTIEBOLAGET L M ERICSSON (publ)
m_szDocSumamry: METHOD AND PAYMENT UNIT FOR CONTROLLING AN AMOUNT AVAILABLE FOR PAYMENT IN A VEHICLE WIPO Patent Application WO/2015/062638 A1 Abstract: This disclosure provides a method, performed in a payment unit 30,30' in a vehicle having an energy storage, of controlling an amount available for payment. The method comprises: determining SI a state of charge of the energy storage of the vehicle, and calculating S2 the amount to be available for payment based on the determined state of charge of the energy storage. Inventors: LAWRENSON, Matthew, John (Iprova Sàrl, PSE C EPFL, Lausanne, CH-1015, CH) NOLAN,
